data.title: Ben Chapman on LinkedIn: Putting it through the roof for the UK’s Armed Forces. Specialist events…
data.meta_description: Putting it through the roof for the UK’s Armed Forces. Specialist events at scale - thank you BFBS Live Events!
data.text:
WORD OF THE DAY: PELOTA In Spanish, “pelota” means “ball,” but this word is also the name of a game played with that ball and rackets shaped like baskets (called “cinta”) attached to the players’ hands. The sport acquired the name “jai alai” (which translates to “merry festival” from the Basque language) when it came to Cuba in 1910. Pelota and jai alai have ancient roots in the Basque culture (an ethnic group and geographic region spread across France and Spain), but the fast-paced sport gained worldwide popularity in the early to mid-20th century. As players race across the walled three-sided court, hurling the pelota with the cinta, the pelota can reach speeds above 150 mph. The pelota is traditionally made of hard rubber, covered in leather, and is just smaller than a baseball, but harder than a golf ball. “We need a new pelota for the tournament next weekend.” Improve your vocabulary, one day at a time! https://lnkd.in/eWHERa_w #ImproveYourVocabulary #WhatImlearningToday #Worddaily #WordOfTheDay #Pelota #realtor® #EllaDrummondRealtor #resendeimoveis #emanuelladrummond #elladrummond #EDRealtor #elladrummondrealtor #edrealtor #EDR

Slang Series Day 11: Learn the meaning of ‘Kisser’ and how to use it in a sentence!Day 11 ofis here and the slang of the day isIt means mouth, like when Pathirana tried to catch the ball and it hit hisStay tuned for more fun slang words with me, Kuldeep!#slangseries #day11 #kisser #mouth #example #pathirana #ball #

2nd friendly for GKS Tychy (1 liga Poland) vs MFK Karvina(First Tier Czech Republic) - Coach put me in 82nd Min. In this situation you have two options, to complain about not getting more playing time. - Or go in and show that you deserve to play more. - I come in and literally the first play is to progress forward and make an effective play. - Control the controllables. This is something every player should understand

Are your students getting the most benefit possible from their rond de jambes? In this video I explain the single most important detail in the rond de jambe movement and show how the complexity of rond de jambe builds throughout the Geeky Ballerina curriculum. #ballet #danceeducation #dance #danceclass #dancestudio #danceteacher

Today we cover the three basic movements of Jiu Jitsu. These movements form the foundation of techniques like sweeps, submissions, and escapes. Many teachers do not show them separately, and many jiu jitsu students end up missing them. These movements can be done on your own or with a partner, can be drilled exclusively for their own purpose, or worked in combination with their larger technical foundations. Check it out! Rumble https://lnkd.in/eTt73-HH YouTube https://lnkd.in/eiJmsEvY

Immerse yourself in the world of No-Gi Jiu-Jitsu, a captivating evolution of Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu that takes the art of grappling beyond the confines of the traditional gi. Uncover the distinctive techniques, agile movements, and strategic adaptations that define No-Gi Jiu-Jitsu's dynamic approach to ground combat. From intricate transitions to precise submissions, this guide delves into the essence of No-Gi Jiu-Jitsu, emphasizing adaptability, speed, and the art of control. https://lnkd.in/dQFqaNeq

Muay thai is Kickboxing plus More, using the 8 weapons of Muay thai as a base there are no limits! Which is also a metaphor for life. Muay Thai Boosts your strength and endurance to Improve self defense skills, Regular training relieve stress, increase focus and performance optimization. https://lnkd.in/gbZnib_C

Here is the BEST BLOCK for STRAIGHT PUNCHES! The blocks of Muay Thai Kickboxing are so effective because many of them mimic the natural response that a human would make to stop a strike when startled or afraid. This ties the movement into our natural response to bond with it and convert it into a part of our natural reflexes to want to cover & hide. In this video I show you the technique that I name "Close the Curtain". It is a very effective block to stop even powerful straight punches like the Jab & Cross.
